item.title: Use AutoHotKey Together With Synergy
item.description: Recently I am using Surface Pro as my second screen, my main screen runs Linux, whose Copy/Paste could be done via mouse(mouse left key for selecting and copy to clipboard, middle key for pasting). While the Windows doesn’t have the same configuration for Copy/Paste(You could only use Ctrl+c/Ctrl+v), which makes me feels so low-efficiency. That’s why I use AutoHotKey. Installation Download the AutoHotKey from http://www.autohotkey.com/ Install it on Windows 8.
